title: Bug 23935 Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both widgets are children of the shell. The right tree and text only work on Windows. We can probably work around by creating the text editor as a sibling of the tree and moving it above the tree.
OB: Currently, when you click anywhere in the tree, the tree retains focus.
EB: The expected behavior is that when you click anywhere in the tree, the tree should not retain focus.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application where the tree and text editor are both displayed. 
2. Click anywhere in the tree. 
Expected result: The tree should lose focus.
